sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react' // import BookDetails from './BookDetails' import {Popup, Label, Rating, Image, Card } from 'semantic-ui-react' export class BookCard extends Component { handleClick = () => { console.log('you are in click') } render() { return ( {this.props.book.volumeInfo.title} {this.props.book.volumeInfo.authors} } > Book Description {this.props.book.searchInfo.textSnippet} ) } } export default BookCard
